title: Ms. Polly's Cakes
overview: Ms. Polly is the resident cake master of Savannah and its unofficial mayor! She's been baking for more than 18 years, and her patrons travel far and wide for her custom cakes. Helping her run the bakery's two locations are her four kids, who she calls "the Giants." Together, they create amazing cakes and keep Savannah's sweet tooth satisfied!
